extendedInfo.description: Bank from anywhere â even from the palm of your hand. With UMB Mobile Banking you can conduct your daily banking, control your finances and safeguard your account from anywhere at any time. The UMB Mobile Banking app lets you check balances, transfer funds, receive alerts, pay bills, and locate ATMs on-the go. With UMB Mobile Banking, you get:Convenience -- bank from anywhere at any time with any mobile deviceIncreased security â by setting up alerts that are sent to your mobile device, you can know right away if your balance drops below a certain level or if a withdrawal over a certain dollar amount has occurred.Control -- you can transfer money and pay bills using any mobile device â this puts you in control of your money â it goes where you want it, when you want it to goWith UMB Mobile Banking, you can:View your account balanceReview your transaction historyTransfer money between accountsPay bills and view payment historyGet alerts forâ¦Low balanceDeposit or withdrawal confirmationCheck clearedWithdrawal threshold exceededLocate UMB ATMs and Banking CentersFor more information, visit www.umb.com/mobile Mobile Banking SecurityYour personal information is protected by advanced encryption technology to prevent unauthorized access.No personal data is stored on your device.We are committed to protecting the privacy of your financial information. See our privacy policy at www.umb.com/privacy UMB Mobile Banking is free, however, you may be charged for web/data access by your mobile carrier.  Check with your carrier for details.

reviews.title: Very poor.
reviews.comment: Obviously no effort was made to create an app. Nothing more than a bookmark.
reviews.author: Doug Vaughan

reviews.title: Waste of time.
reviews.comment: Its faster and easier to just use the browser.  And that is not fast at all.  This app could have been developed better in by a high school student.
reviews.author: Jack Robertson

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: Like others that have reviewed, I have been waiting for a while on this so called app and I\'m disappointed to say the least. Just a shortcut to the website. Joke.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Web launcher only
reviews.comment: Unfortunate that UMB made a great apple app but can only provide a web launcher for android. But the mobile site does everything as promised above.
reviews.author: Ashley Vogt

reviews.comment: It\'s not an app. And like 90% of the time it won\'t even log in properly to the mobile site. Seriously disappointing
reviews.author: Jenna Lee Lovesmore

reviews.title: Simple, Easy, Works Well
reviews.comment: Simple web launcher to the mobile site that many didn\'t know about. Nice to have a shortcut now instead of typing the address out every time or navigating piles of browser bookmarks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple shortcut to their mobile site
reviews.comment: Another fail by a failing financial institution.  I\'ll be so glad when I get all my bill pay items moved so I can be done with them for good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice start
reviews.comment: Not a bad start, but it is web based and opens a browser. Not much different than going to UMB through a web browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not really an app
reviews.comment: It\'s not really an app, but it is 100% faster than using the browser, it has a different setup too. Fast and convienent.
reviews.author: Johnna Reno

reviews.title: Nice thought but seriously lacking
reviews.comment: Coming back to Android from an iPhone, this \"app\" is bad. iPhone is an actual app that functions alone. You can do everything right from the phone. This, as stated by others, is simply a shortcut to the mobile site. That is nice, makes it easy but I don\'t find the mobile site very friendly and difficult to decipher. This needs to be an actual app and not just a link.
reviews.author: Jim Berry

reviews.title: BEGINNER APP
reviews.comment: THIS APP SEEMS LIKE IT HAS NEVER EVER BEEN UPGRARED SINCE BEING FIRST RELEASED. GUESS THEY CARELESS ABOUT CUSTOMER CONVENIENCE!!!!
reviews.author: Emilio Ojeda

reviews.title: A Waste and a Disappointment
reviews.comment: Will not work on my phone and I have a galaxy note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works now
reviews.comment: Does what is suppose to do. I can check all of my account, transfer funds, set preferences and more.
reviews.author: Helen Lee

reviews.title: Umb bank app
reviews.comment: It is a terrible app I cant even get into it on my note 2 wont load on the internet and it force closes terrible please update and mabye we will all be a little bit more apt to use it
reviews.author: Justin Waller

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I was able to open, once I confirmed who I am and signed the agreement. It looks just like the video demo show.
reviews.author: Kathy Pauley

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Just a shortcut to the website like others have said. If you are going to develop an app then develop an app don\'t just put a shortcut to the website
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Joke
reviews.comment: It just opens a browser window to the mobile page. Hopefully they have plans to make it not suck.
reviews.author: Nathaniel Chester
